abstract.t: This document specifies an xmlns-local() scheme for use in XPointer-based fragment identifiers. This scheme, like other XPointerFramework [13] schemes, is designed primarily for use with the XMLMedia Types defined in RFC 3023 [5], to identify locations within agiven XML representation of a resource. The xmlns-local() schemenotifies an XPointer processor that it should include all of thenamespace binding context defined for the element containing theXPointer in the namespace binding context for the XPointer.
